title: Security Features

visitProof.title: Geolocated Visit Proof
visitProof.description: We capture the exact location, date, and time of each visit and issue a digital certificate. Just scan the code with your mobile!

electronicSignature.title: Electronic Signature
electronicSignature.description: Visitors sign digitally using a QR code — faster, paperless, and legally valid.

documentVerification.title: Document Verification
documentVerification.description: Stop fraud before it happens. We detect fake income statements and forged documents with AI-powered checks.

appointmentReminders.title: Appointment Reminders
appointmentReminders.description: Reduce no-shows by up to 50% with automated reminders for every visit.

identityCrossVerification.title: Identity Cross-Verification
identityCrossVerification.description: Add an extra layer of security with VerifID — combines real identity data with property viewing records.

identityVerification.title: Identity Verification
identityVerification.description: We verify every client's identity to eliminate fake data and give you complete legal protection.

adminOnlyDescription: This feature is only for admin panels, property sellers, agents and real estate agencies — not for regular buyers.
